mods.note: Orginally for 2 pianos, Contrastes Mexicanos was orchestrated at the request of Harvey Garber, the then associate of the San Antonio Symphony. Place of performance unknown. Contents: I. La Plaza Garibaldi (begins at :00--II. La Ninfa con Arco (begins at 3:47)--III. Los Taxis (begins at 6:58).
